entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to free himself from Wormtail's grasp.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A ratlike man who has silver fingers and is struggling against Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who helps to subdue Wormtail by taking his wand.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Wormtail's alias, whose pupils dilate in terror as he realizes what is happening.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The one who gave Wormtail the silver fingers.

relationships.description: Harry tries to free himself from Wormtail's grasp, but his hand seems to have a mind of its own.
Ron helps Harry by taking Wormtail's wand away.
